title: Upgrading the Diagnostic Laboratory of the Department of Pathology Faculty of Medicine, University of Jaffna
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to upgrade the Diagnostic Laboratory of the Department of Pathology Faculty of Medicine, University of Jaffna at a project cost of Rs.28.85 million with funds to be provided under the Medium Term Budgetary Framework 2012 - 2014, was approved by the Cabinet.
